Literature.Title: The inhibitory activity of a new scorpion venom-derived antimicrobial peptide Hp1470 against Gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Li S, Liu G, Kang J, Li Z, Cao Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus AB94004(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus AB208193(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 14458(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis AB208187(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis AB208188(MIC=25µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus AB93113(MIC=50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus P1383(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus P1389(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus P1369(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus P1386(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis P1111(MIC=6.25µg/ml)
